example.eg: What brand of shoes do you buy?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 商标, 牌子, 品牌

example.eg: The farmer branded the cow with a hot iron.
example.egtrans: 农场主用滚烫的铁在母牛身上打下烙印。

example.eg: The others didn't share his brand of conservatism.
example.egtrans: 其他人并不欣赏他守旧的行事风格。

example.eg: The brand was hot and ready to mark the cattle.
example.egtrans: 烙铁已经滚烫，准备好给牛群烙印了。

example.eg: You could tell the owner by the cow's brand.
example.egtrans: 你可以从奶牛身上的烙印判断出它的主人是谁。

example.eg: Some deaf children refuse to wear hearing aids because they are afraid of being branded.
example.egtrans: 一些聋哑儿童拒绝佩戴助听器，因为他们怕蒙上污名。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打上…的烙印, 使…蒙上污名

example.eg: Because of his radical views, he was branded a revolutionary.
example.egtrans: 由于他激进的观点，人们称他为革命者。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…指责为, 将…抹黑为

dsense.name: a whole new ball game, a brand new ball game

example.eg: That puts matters in a different light.  It's a brand new ball game now.
Companies pay to have their names on athletes' uniforms in order to promote brand awareness.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 品牌意识, 商标意识

example.eg: Toyota has destroyed its brand loyalty with all of the hidden defects.
She is the brand manager for Kleenex tissues.
Does anyone have any better ideas for a new brand name?
example.egtrans: 关于品牌名称，谁还有更好的点子么？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 商标名称, 品牌名称

example.eg: Car dealers have a spray that gives used cars that brand-new car smell.
example.egtrans: 汽车经销商有一种能让旧车发出新车味道的喷雾。//我刚买了一双溜冰鞋，是全新的！

example.eg: I have a brand-spanking new computer with Windows 8.
example.egtrans: 我有一台安装windows 8的全新电脑。

dsense.name: on-brand
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (typical, characteristic: of a person)

dsense.name: own brand
dsense.guideword: UK (private label: for a specific retailer)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自有品牌, 私有品牌

dsense.name: own-brand
dsense.guideword: UK (private label: of a specific retailer)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自有品牌的, 私有品牌的
